sect1.title: Genesis Installation
sect1.para: Installing Genesis as a stand alone Network Appliance type installation.
Once the Genesis device is identified, install Genesis.
Follow these steps to install Genesis. Once it is successfully installed, you can use it to manage the other servers in your cluster.
